name: Successfully fetch the PDF report of a performed measurement
testSteps: Setup a Flutter project that has the SDK as a dependency
Correctly authenticate against FibriCheck Cloud and make sure the user has an active prescription.
Find an existing successful measurementId or perform a measurement using the FibriCheck Camera SDK and upload the measurement.
Use the method `getMeasurementReportUrl` to retrieve a PDF report of the measurement.
expectedResult: The method returns an URL and a PDF report is publicly available at the returned URL.
parentNames: Upload a measurement to the FibriCheck cloud for analysis
Upload a measurement to FibriCheck Cloud
Method `postMeasurement` uploads a measurement to FibriCheck Cloud
